name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Automation Engineer with over 10 years of experience in software development, specializing in **Python**, **pytest**, and automation frameworks. Highly skilled in **Selenium** and **Playwright** for test automation, ensuring optimal performance and reliability of software solutions through robust performance testing using **Locust** and **Allure**. Proven ability to lead projects in Agile environments, focusing on efficient data analytics and integration of **GenAI** technologies to enhance automation processes. Demonstrates exceptional communication skills and a strong understanding of the software development lifecycle to deliver high-quality, compliant solutions. A strategic thinker with a solid background in full stack development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, and **Node.js**, dedicated to driving impactful results while fostering collaboration across teams.
